JOB DESCRIPTION: Skill Requirement :    Strong knowledge of .NET framework  Strong understanding of object-oriented programming  Proficient in C# and ASP.NET with a good knowledge of their ecosystems,   Good knowledge of JavaScript, jQuery & Web API  Familiarity with Microsoft SQL Server, Windows Presentation Framework, Installshield  Familiar with various design and architectural patterns  Ability to write clean, readable, and easily maintainable code  Understanding of fundamental design principles for building a scalable application  Experience creating database schemas that represent and support business processes  Proficient understanding of code versioning tools (such as Git, SVN)  Should be open to learn new technology or framework    Role & Responsibilities :   Translate requirements and use cases into functional applications  Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code   Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications  Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to mitigate and address these issues   Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization
